mapper.sql: customer_id, customer_mobile, open_id, lat, lon, nick_name, head_img, created, created_by, created_by_name, updated, updated_by, updated_by_name, session_key, status
mapper.select:
select cui.customer_id,cui.nick_name,cui.customer_mobile,cui.open_id,cui.status,sui.store_name from customer_user_info cui left join customer_store_relation csr on cui.customer_id = csr.customer_id left join store_user_info sui on csr.store_user_id = sui.id
cui.nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
cui.customer_mobile = #{customerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
cui.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} and
cui.status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} and
sui.store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

update customer_user_info
customer_mobile = #{customerMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
